original_text: (“‘These are the Lord’s appointed festivals, which you are to proclaim as sacred assemblies for bringing food offerings to the Lord—the burnt offerings and grain offerings, sacrifices and drink offerings required for each day.
korean_text: 이것들은 여호와의 절기라 너희는 공포하여 성회를 열고 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 번제와 소제와 희생제물과 전제를 각각 그 날에 드릴지니

sentences.original_text: These are the Lord's appointed festivals
which you are to proclaim as sacred assemblies
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 거룩한 모임으로 선포해야 할 것들입니다

sentences.original_text: for bringing food offerings to the Lord
the burnt offerings and grain offerings
